Physical ConstantsÂ¶

Module for keeping track of physical constants. All constants in cgs units.

The constants defined are:
  • mathematical: - pi - pi
  • angles: - deg - degrees per radian - sq_deg - square degrees per steradian - arcmin - arc minutes per radian - arsec - arc seconds per radian
  • distances: - len_ns - distance light travels in 1 nanosecond - ft - 1 foot - km - 1 kilometer - au - 1 astronomical unit - pc - 1 parsec
  • times: - s_per_day - number of seconds in a solar dary - s_per_yr - number of seconds in a year - len_ns - distance light travels in 1 nanosecond
  • physical: - c - speed of light - G - Newton’s gravitational constant - h - Planck’s constants - k - Boltzmann’s constant - s - Sefan-Boltzmann constant - ev - 1 electron volt - e - elementary charge - m_e - electron mass - m_p - proton mass - r_sun - radius of the Sun - m_sun - mass of the Sun

The list of avaliable constants and their descriptions can also be accessed within Python via:

>>> from aipy import const
>>> for key, value in const.description().iteritems():
...    print "%s: %s" % (key, value)
...
